properties.entry: SELECT STYLE_NO , PROFILE_IMG , COUNT , USER_NICKNAME , HASHTAG FROM (SELECT STYLE_NO , COUNT(*) "COUNT" FROM TB_STYLE_LIKE GROUP BY STYLE_NO ORDER BY COUNT DESC) RIGHT JOIN TB_STYLE S USING (STYLE_NO) JOIN TB_USER USING (USER_NO) WHERE S.STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT IMG_NO , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH , STYLE_NO FROM TB_STYLE_IMG WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
